attributes.action: Make it compulsory for someone to provide fingerprint, photo and DNA to an officer on demand at any time whilst in a public place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets tighten security in this country, like ID cards, if you have nothing to hide, it shouldn't be a problem. People complain about this country being a police state; well in my opinion things would run a lot smoother if it was...

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
